title: Hyperlink InfoSystem aims high with expansion of mobile app development capabilities
text:
Published on Thursday, 22 October 2015 21:23 Submitted by Eza Ezamie WhaTech Pro Page views: 51 times Most organizations think of Mobile Apps as an extension of what their website does, but that isn’t necessarily true. With more and more people making a mobile device the center of their digital lives, mobile app development has become a matter of providing an engaging platform that organizations use to meet the needs of their customers or audience. 
That is where Hyperlink InfoSystem , a growing mobile app development company comes into the picture. It is a fresh startup headed by one of the youngest entrepreneurs in around. And are now starting to make waves in the industry. 
In a recent interview with the company’s director and founder, Harnil Oza who at the tender young age of 25, shared his thoughts on with WhaTech on what Hyperlink Infosystem have achieved and where they are heading in the near future. 
Hyperlink Infosystem have been developing many quality apps for satisfied international clients and are getting lots of rave reviews for their successful apps development. 
According to Harnil, “ In the last 2 years, we have developed more than 400 apps from Social Networking, to business applications and also a few games. By December 2015, we will be having a great leap in Game Development. With the growth of our team, you can expect even more quality games from us”. 
Started in Ahmedabad in India, Hyperlink Infosystem has grown from strength to strength and in just one year; their staff strength has doubled from 40 to 80 employees. The revenue of the company has also doubled in 2015 compared with last year. 
With growing demand and expectations from clients, they have bought a new office with more than 3000 square feet as part of their expansion plan. They are also now looking forward to an expansion to California, Europe and the Middle East. It is expected that by 2016, the expansion would be completed and they would have 150 employees. 
Harnil adds, “Hyperlink Infosystem have also helped many startups by providing app development at reasonable cost” , so be sure to check them out. 
For more information, please visit https://www.hyperlinkinfosystem.com/
